section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Salamah that the Prophet (ï·º) once prayed two Rak'ahs after 'Asr in her house. She asked him about that and he said:"They are two Rak'ahs that I used to pray after Zuhr, but I got distracted and forgot them until I prayed 'Asr
